SELECT ORD_NO, ORD_HIST_SEQ, ORD_STAT_CD, ORD_HIST_WRTR_EML, DATE_FORMAT(ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM, ORD_HIST_HIST_CONT
FROM sms_ms_ord_hist WHERE 1=1
ORD_NO like #ordNo#
ORD_HIST_SEQ like #ordHistSeq#
ORD_HIST_WRTR_EML like #ordHistWrtrEml#
ORDER BY ORD_HIST_SEQ DESC

SELECT ORD_NO, ORD_HIST_SEQ, ORD_STAT_CD, ORD_HIST_WRTR_EML, DATE_FORMAT(ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM , ORD_HIST_HIST_CONT FROM sms_ms_ord_hist WHERE 1=1 AND ORD_HIST_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(ORD_HIST_SEQ) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist WHERE 1=1 and ORD_NO like #ordNo# ) AND ORD_NO like #ordNo#
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ORD_HIST_SEQ),0) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist WHERE 1=1 AND ORD_NO = #ordNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sms_ms_ord_hist SET ORD_STAT_CD = #ordStatCd#, ORD_HIST_WRTR_EML = #ordHistWrtrEml#, ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM = NOW(), ORD_HIST_HIST_CONT = #ordHistHistCont# WHERE ORD_NO=#ordNo# AND ORD_HIST_SEQ=#ordHistSeq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sms_ms_ord_hist ( ORD_NO, ORD_HIST_SEQ, ORD_STAT_CD, ORD_HIST_WRTR_EML, ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM, ORD_HIST_HIST_CONT ) VALUES ( #ordNo#, #ordHistSeq#, #ordStatCd#, #ordHistWrtrEml#, NOW(), #ordHistHistCont# )
